articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Kohli was asked lot of questions in 2014, 2021...': Chappell ahead of WTC final - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ahead of WTC final where India face Australia at The Oval, former captain Greg Chappell made a big Virat Kohli prediction. | Cricket
articles.content: Eyeing history, India face Australia in the World Test Championship final, at the Oval in London, scheduled to begin from June 7. India will be aiming to clinch their first-ever WTC title, after havi… [+4094 chars]
